short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to export tab information to the clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Export is a simple extension to turn a set of tabs into a text based list that can be stored offline. Tab Export only reads the tabs in the active window.

User's can configure the output of the list by changing:
  * the fields used, i.e.: the tab's title, the tab's URL and the position (or index) of the tab in the window,
  * the order of the fields, and
  * the separator between the fields

Example output:

1 | Reddit - Dive into anything | https://www.reddit.com/
2 | Google | https://www.google.com/
